careerAdvisorResponses.greeting: Hello! I'm your AI Career Advisor. I can help you with career guidance, resume tips, interview prep, and learning strategies. What would you like to know?
careerAdvisorResponses.skillGap: Based on your current profile, you're missing {missingCount} key skills. I recommend focusing on {topMissing} first, as these are in high demand and will significantly improve your qualification percentage.
careerAdvisorResponses.trendingAdvice: The job market is shifting towards {trendingSkill}. This skill is growing at {growthRate}% yearly. Learning it could increase your market value by 25-40%.
careerAdvisorResponses.interviewTip: Pro tip: When asked about your strengths, mention specific projects where you've used your technical skills. Quantify your impact: 'Improved performance by X%' or 'Reduced costs by X hours'.
careerAdvisorResponses.careerPath: Based on your skills, you're well-positioned for roles in {role}. You could also leverage your current skills to transition into {alternativeRole}.
careerAdvisorResponses.learningStrategy: Here's a personalized strategy: 1) Master fundamentals in {fundamental} 2) Build real projects 3) Learn {trending} skills 4) Contribute to open source 5) Document your journey on GitHub.

resumeSuggestions.title: Add Skills Section with Proficiency Levels
resumeSuggestions.description: Organize technical proficiencies with explicit levels (Beginner, Intermediate, Expert)

resumeSuggestions.title: Quantify Your Achievements
resumeSuggestions.description: Use metrics instead of vague descriptions. Example: 'Increased performance by 40%' instead of 'Improved performance'

resumeSuggestions.title: Showcase Projects with Links
resumeSuggestions.description: Include 2-3 significant projects with GitHub links, technologies used, and measurable impact

resumeSuggestions.title: Add Relevant Certifications
resumeSuggestions.description: List certifications and online courses that validate your technical skills and show continuous learning

resumeSuggestions.title: Optimize for ATS Systems
resumeSuggestions.description: Include keywords from job descriptions in your resume to pass Applicant Tracking System filters

technical.question: Explain your most complex project. What technologies did you use and what challenges did you face?
technical.tip: Focus on the problem you solved, not just what you built. Show your thought process.

technical.question: How do you approach learning a new technology or framework?
technical.tip: Show you're proactive. Mention specific resources and how you apply new knowledge.

technical.question: Tell me about a time you had to debug a complex issue. How did you approach it?
technical.tip: Use the STAR method: Situation, Task, Action, Result. Show your analytical thinking.

behavioral.question: Describe a time you had to work with a difficult team member.
behavioral.tip: Show emotional intelligence. Focus on what you learned and how you grew.

behavioral.question: Tell me about a project that failed. What did you learn?
behavioral.tip: Be honest but constructive. Show growth mindset.

behavioral.question: How do you handle tight deadlines and pressure?
behavioral.tip: Give a concrete example. Show you stay calm and communicate well.

taskTypes.description: Read official docs for {technology} and summarize key concepts
Find and work on a GitHub issue in {project}
